scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:next && npm run setup:strapi
scripts.dev: npm run clear && concurrently "npm run dev:next" "npm run dev:strapi"
scripts.seed: cd strapi && npm run strapi import -f ../seed-data.tar.gz
scripts.config:dump: cd strapi && npm run strapi configuration:dump -- -f dump.json
scripts.config:restore: cd strapi && npm run strapi configuration:restore -- -f dump.json
scripts.export: cd strapi && npm run strapi export --no-encrypt -f ../seed-data
